snippet: Before she was facing a murder charge, Gu Kailai, the wife of deposed political leader Bo Xilai, wrote a book disparaging aspects of the United States legal system.

byline.original: Compiled by THE NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: Before she was facing a murder charge, Gu Kailai, the wife of deposed political leader Bo Xilai, wrote a book disparaging aspects of the United States legal system.

headline.seo: Excerpts From Gu Kailai’s Book, ‘Winning a Lawsuit in the U.S.’
